column4: Anyone know how to probe the s3 virge mx in hoary? it wont work...
Noone know how to choose video card in ubuntu? I have a s3 virge mx and it wont work, only 640x480. In wharty it works fine...
I understand if you guys can't help me with my problem, but you could atleast have the courtesy to give me a hint where to find the info... This is not what I call a "good" support channel"...
zen, did so, couldnt find any info
first make sure that all XFree86 stuff is purged. Then try "sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg"
then stap yourself in the eye for switching to Hoary when you dont know how to purge packages and use apt
I don't have any eyes... I'm blind... I get error: conflict when i do the dpkg..

I think the largest hurdle when switching from Warty to Hoary is to remove XFree86 in favour of Xorg... try marking xserver-xfree86 for deletion in aptitude and see if it will be able to resolve dependencies - that will be a start.

Ok I'm now trying to use xfree86.. I have another q if  you can answer it: I need to use ProTools Free for win98. I've found wine to be somewhat unreliable. Is there any other emulation software for win98 which can do  the job?
You dont want to use xfree86 (and Lathiat is right; it shouldnt be intalled). You want to use Xorg. I dont know anything protools
and still only 640x480 res? try "sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg"
i did that. and i got the error : conflict in action, --control and --remove..
actually, any dpkg responds with the conflict error..
there could be some pending packages with buggy configuration scripts that's blocking apt
